page.title: 14TELEVISION IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: {TELEVISION}IS VERY,VERY POPULAR. TELEVISIONS COME IN DIFFERENT SIZES. THESE DAYS YOU USUALLY GET PICTURES IN {COLOUR,}BUT SOME ARE IN{BLACK AND {WHITE.}SOMETIMES THEY SHOW OLD FILMS ON SUNDAY AFTERNOONS,BUT MOST PROGRAMMES ARE UP TO DATE,LIKE THE {NEWS,WILDLIFE PROGRAMMES}AND{SCHOOL {PROGRAMMES. IN THE EARLY EVENING,WHEN WE COME HOME FROM SCHOOL,THERE'S{"CHILDREN'S {I.T.V."}I ENJOY THIS VERY MUCH.IT HAS A VARIETY OF THINGS ON LIKE CARTOONS, QUIZZES AND STORY PROGRAMMES.THEN FOR {THE ADULTS,}LATER ON AT NIGHT,THERE'S FILMS,DRAMAS AND NEWS. TO CONTROL THE{T.V}THERE'S SOME BUTTONS WHICH CHANGE THE CHANNEL,ALTER THE SOUND AND MANY OTHER THINGS.THE MORE UP TO DATE THING IS{THE REMOTE {CONTROL.}THIS A BLOCK OF PLASTIC WITH BUTTONS.
